text: Yi bastiharuka kehi vrtanta hamile tapa'inla'i varnana garirakheka chaum ra uniharuka paigaÃmbara uniharuko pasama nisaniharu li'era a'e, tara yasto bha'ena ki uniharule juna kurala'i prarambhama jhutha bhanisakeka thi'e tyasama pheri visvasa garun. Allaha yastai prakarale kaphiraharuko hrdayama chapa laga'idincha
